description:
A man learns about the importance of community, a couple creates a child from dirt, and a skylark ruins everything.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Namida ga Koboreru / Chikaratarou / Hibari to Wakamizu
Tears Overflow / Strong Tarou / The Skylark and the Water of Youth
涙がこぼれる / 力太郎 / ひばりと若水
